price: ¿Acaso no son estos juramentos [argumentos suficientes sobre el poder de Dios] para los dotados de intelecto?
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
